Scrap Prowl's last post, this has what it had (slightly modified).

::Kluster/Prowl::

kluster frowns, looking around. This was pissing him off. Activating 
the comm, one more time, he sends a transmission to ALL MAXIMALS.

"All Maximals, this is the third call to the meeting at the 
Cybertronian Fire. Get to the conference room immediately."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl glances at Iron Raptor as he hears her thoughts. He didn't mean 
to imply that she was weak by protecting her.

-I didn't say you were weak, love- he replies through thought, 
looking over at her as she stepped up. His eyes slid over her form, 
her curves showing through nicely. Prowl jerks his eyes back to 
shadown, but then frowns as he hears Iron Raptor's thoughts. The 
mixed beast mode wasn't gone?

Iris had said that the merge would take care of the problem. But what 
if it hadn't? What if Iron Raptor could still get stuck in that form? 
Prowl shakes his head. It wasn't very likely. It was only a thought, 
after all.

He looks back at Iron Raptor as she yells the command, watching her 
go into the 'battle mode', or at least that's what he thought it was. 
He smiles as he looks her over. Her curves still showed through. She 
looked like a warrior now that she stood as tall as Prowl, but she 
was still definetly feminine. Prowl smiles. He wouldn't mind finding 
out how it felt to kiss her in that mode...

Kluster's transmission sounds in Prowl's head, distracting him from 
Iron Raptor's words to Shadow. This mode obvioustly had a comm-link.

-Kluster's calling all Maximals to a meeting, love- he says to her 
using his thoughts -We should get over to the Cybertronian Fire-





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> 
> * Iron Raptor snappes her head towards the new voice just as Prowl 
frowns, 
> not seeing the bot right away but making sense of what feeling she 
was 
> recieving from Prowls mind, only amplafying it with her own senses.
> But where Prowl thought that this bot was not friendly, she left 
room for

had always

> 
> But then her eyes turned to Prowl just as some idea poped into his 
head, 
> reading or more like FEELING the words with which to speak before 
they 
> emerged out of his mouth.
> Forgetting about the heavy wings at her back.
> Though, watching and feeling in wonder as she watched the results 
of that 
> one word.
> It was a battle mode!!
> Only with a new command and new results!!
> Iron Raptor watched as armor split to be replaced by another coat 
of it, 
> only silver and by the sense of it...far more stronger.
> It even went beyond the limits of Transmetal 2s!
> Wow!
> 
> But once the transformation was through and the newly armored Prowl 
stood 
> between her and the new visitor her mind had only one thing to 
think of at 
> that moment, and her thoughts were directed right towards Prowl.**
> 
> < Oh no you don't! I can protect myself! What sort of weakling do 
you think 
> I am?!>
> 
> * And with that she stepped towards the new bot, thanking tha 
Matrix above 
> that her hair covered her, still, naked form. But not for long.
> Basically the same thing had happened to Prowl as had happened to 
her, they 
> had both fused and her scanners indicated that she was now...part 
snow owl. 
> That was where the wings had come from.
> So, not that Prowl and herself were fused physically and mentally, 
sharing 
> everything, then the only conclusion was that she would have 
something 
> towards a similar battle mode...and perhaps the same baqttle 
activation 
> code.
> 
> Iron Raptor stood ready, her crystal blue eyes fixed on the new 
bot, knowing 
> for a fact that he had no chance against just one of them.
> But there was also something in the back of her mind, something 
that was 
> trying to get out. A thought suddenly entering her mind.
> What had really happened about that nightmarish beast mode? Had it 
been 
> wiped out completely? Or simply deactivated?
> Iron Raptor focused on that tingling in the back of her mind, 
suddenly 
> seeing something that almost made her jump back.
> It was there! It was still there! She could see it in her mind.
> On all fours, acidic saliva dripping from it's bared fangs as it 
hunched its 
> soulder. Black exo-armor covering it's body, shining in some inner 
light. 
> Eyes trained forward...almost as it just like...hers....
> Iron Raptors eyes grew big; it was...under controle? No! 
Waiting...waiting 
> to break free? No...ready to pounce? Yes! Ready for action! 
> Just...like...HER! It was listening! Actually listening!
> The image in her mind then pawed the black ground...suddenly 
> feeling...seeing it's toughts!
> Blood, carnage...death! Mutilation!!
> That's all she could feel from it!
> No...it wasn't really under controle...just not wanting to fight 
right now.
> But Iron Raptor then shook her head a bit, suddenly knowing that it 
wanted. 
> For her to transform and at least release a bit of it, to fight.
> Well, the first request she could do!
> 
> Iron Raptor then stepped in front of Prowl, the wind picking up and 
> fluttering her hair a little, but not enough to show anything.
> She took in a deep breath, closing her optics for a moment and 
finding her 
> still point, all going dark around her other then the wind and the 
sound of 
> her own sparkbeat. Concintrating on that beat she opened her eyes, 
gaze 
> straight.*
> 
> " Iron Raptor, ULATRMETAL!!"
> 
> * With that she moved to her toes and whirled in a full circle, her 
mine and 
> thus her eyes seeing nothing but blackness at first but then a 
light 
> surrounding her.
> Her hair seeming to sparkle as it flowed around her as she moved, 
her wings 
> stretching wide before suddenly seeming to bust out as small 
sparkling 
> snow-flakes.
> From the center of her back then seemed to sprout out of her flesh 
two 
> pieces of fluid black armor, so dark that even the light seemed to 
be drawn 
> into them.
> Those two pieces appeared just under her arms and stretched to her 
waist as 
> Iron Raptor lifted her arms over her head, snapping her head 
towards her 
> upraised hands as the pieces then wrapped and molded themselves 
around her 
> chest, slamming together at the center of her torso.
> Then, just as suddenly as before, two pieces of armor sprouted from 
the 
> small of her back this time, coming around to mold themselves to 
her pelvice 
> and thighs. Slamming together with a metallic ring at her groin and 
front 
> thighs.
> Same with her lower legs, another metallic ring sent clear through 
the 
> darkness as, they too, came together.
> Iron Raptor finally lowered her arms, her eyes closed as her head 
became 
> straight, armor also covering her arms up to her wrists, ending in 
a point 
> above her hand.
> Suddenly two large shoulder-plates appeared begind her, slamming 
down on her 
> soulders, the tips reaching even toller then her head. Two large 
diamond 
> shaped rubies in the center of each.
> From there a line of spiked armor as thin as a belt wrapped around 
her 
> waist, a large piece of armor suddenlu developing and closing the 
betl as it 
> fell over her groin area.
> Iron Raptor then opened her eyes as, in a flash of red, a large and 
long 
> cape fell down towards her heals from the back of each shoulder-
plate. Armor 
> then coming from the back of her heals and extending down, covering 
her feet 
> and ending in long sharp, silver raptor claws. The armor so long 
what it 
> looked as if she stood on her tip-toes, yet only raising her height 
a few 
> inches. Only looking like a pair of TMed raptor feet.
> 
> Iron Raptors mind then suddenly cleared in a flash, the blue 
morning sky 
> coming into view, a flock of large crows liting into the air as her 
eyes 
> then turned on the new bot, Shadow.
> Gazing towards him in her new armor, her body looking as if more 
like a 
> knight then Prowl. ( for anyone who's seen the anime Escaflowne, 
her armor 
> is a bit like that. hehehe. If you don't know what Escaflowne is 
then just 
> fo to Ask Jeeves and type in Where can I find pictures of 
Escaflowne, and 
> just look around on the sides that come up. The pica are really 
cool!)
> But she stood squarly, her body looking muck more bulkyier then 
before, but 
> her head remained the same. Silver hair still falling loose from 
her head 
> but now behind her back.
> Her face calm as she stood beside Prowl, now the same size as him.
> 
> Iron Raptor  looked at Shadow, stepping towards him, the sound of 
gears 
> moving and hydrolics working sounding out.*
> 
> " Pay no attention to him.... As commander of the Maximals, I ask 
who you 
> are any why you threaten us so?"
